items.title: Unlocking the Secrets of Cybersecurity - 2 day workshop
items.location: Annexe Building, L.D. College of Engineering (LDCE)
items.excerpt: A two-day hands-on cybersecurity workshop organized by the IT Department of LDCE in collaboration with The Cyber Force (TCF), focusing on cybersecurity fundamentals, digital forensics, server security, and VAPT tools through expert-led sessions.
